abstract: Pete Rugolo, chief arranger for the Stan Kenton Orchestra in its late-1940s heyday and prolific composer and arranger for television and film, dies at age 95.
snippet: Mr. Rugolo was the chief arranger for the Stan Kenton Orchestra in its late-1940s heyday and a prolific composer and arranger for television and film.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rugolo was the chief arranger for the Stan Kenton Orchestra in its late-1940s heyday and a prolific composer and arranger for television and film.

headline.main: Pete Rugolo, Arranger and Composer, Is Dead at 95
